title: The Climate Resilience Fund announces new competition for 2022
content:
Climate Resilience Fund Logo. Credit: CRF
Climate Resilience Fund Logo. Credit: CRF
To scale up and accelerate the pace of equitable climate adaptation planning across the United States, the Climate Resilience Fund's 2022 Coordination and Collaboration in the Resilience Ecosystem (CCRE) Program will provide grants to train climate service practitioners who will engage communities with the goal of producing adaptation plans.
